noun.description: A sofa with padded arms and a back of the same height and curved outward at the top.
A man's plain straight overcoat, typically with a velvet collar.

proper noun.description: A city in eastern Missouri, on the Missouri River, a suburb of St. Louis; population 46,064 (est. 2008).
A town in Derbyshire, north central England; population 71,100 (est. 2009).

origin: Mid 19th century (in chesterfield (sense 2)): named after a 19th-century Earl of Chesterfield.
